name: ext_R5_MonetaryComponent
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MonetaryComponent for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents MonetaryComponent from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MonetaryComponent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.
